com.bytedesk.core.room.database

类 AppDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.arch.persistence.room.RoomDatabase
      • com.bytedesk.core.room.database.AppDatabase

  • public abstract class AppDatabase
extends android.arch.persistence.room.RoomDatabase
    作者:
    bytedesk.com on 2017/9/13. https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/architecture/room.html Note: You should follow the singleton design pattern when instantiating an AppDatabase object, as each RoomDatabase instance is fairly expensive, and you rarely need access to multiple instances. RxJava 2: https://medium.com/google-developers/room-rxjava-acb0cd4f3757, bytedesk.com
